Gus Lobel (Clint Eastwood) was one of the best scouts in baseball for decades, but despite his efforts to hide it, the age is beginning to affect him. However, Gus, who can identify a good pitcher just by the sound of batting, refuses to go to the bench in what may be the last innings (entries) of his career. He may have no choice. The board of the Atlanta Braves are starting to question their criteria, especially with the most disputed selection of promising hitters approaching. The only person who can help him is also the only person who would never ask Gus: his daughter, Mickey (Amy Adams).
